name: Accordion Room Divider - Translucent Panels
description: Reimagine your Ottawa living space with our Accordion Room Divider system. Featuring translucent acrylic panels that allow light to flow while creating visual separation, this versatile solution transforms open-concept areas into flexible, multi-functional zones. The patented folding mechanism stacks panels compactly against the wall when not in use, requiring just 8 inches of clearance. Perfect for basement apartments, home offices, studio spaces, and creating temporary guest rooms across Ottawa, Nepean, and Gloucester. Each panel features reinforced aluminum framing with UV-resistant acrylic that won't yellow or crack over time. The ceiling-mounted track system installs without floor rails, making it ideal for radiant heating and maintaining a seamless floor transition. Operates smoothly with one hand, includes magnetic panel locks for secure positioning, and acoustically dampens sound by up to 28 dB. Professional installation ensures proper header support and precise alignment. Available in translucent white or smoked grey to complement any interior design.
